title: Wild Magic
text: Roll twice on the Rod of Wonder table (DMG 237)

title: Magic Fatigue
text: You cannot cast any spells for 1 round

title: You made Him Stronger
text: The target gains a +8 enhancement bonus to Str for 1d4 rounds

title: Clatto Verata Necktie
text: Your attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

title: Hit by the Ugly Forest
text: You take 1 point of Cha bleed

title: The Magic is Gone
text: You take a -4 penalty to attack rolls until you scare a critical hit

title: Can you hear me now?
text: You are deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal check)

title: Error!
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target

title: Why Me?
text: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all threatening foes

title: Left Reeling
text: You are stunned for 1 round (Fort negates)]

title: Nothing to Fear
text: You are shaken for 2d4 rounds

title: Bleeding Eyes
text: You take 1d6 points of bleed

title: Acidic Backlash
text: You take 2d6 points of acid damage

title: Backblast
text: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

title: Arcane Fire
text: You take 2d6 points of fire damage

title: Electrical Feedback
text: You take 2d6 points of electricity damage

title: Cursed
text: You take a -4 penalty on attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks. This effect can only be cured with remove curse

title: You made him faster
text: The target is hasted for 1d4 rounds

title: You made him tougher
text: The target gains DR 5/-for 1d4 rounds

title: Vertigo
text: You are sickened for 1d4 rounds

title: Apprentice Move
text: Reroll attack against creature nearest the target (yourself excluded)

title: Not me, You fool!
text: Your attack hits your ally closest to the target

title: Tiring Spell
text: You are fatigued

title: Tangled
text: You become entangled in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself

title: Nose Bleed
text: You take 1 point of bleed

title: Weakened
text: You take a -2 penalty to all your Spell DCs for 1d4 minutes

title: Poor Trade
text: The attack hits you but you must lose a spell or slot of the highest available level (your choice)

title: Distance Rift
text: You are teleported the nearest square adjacent to the target

title: Mind Drain
text: You take 1d4 points of damage to Int, Wis, or Cha (determined randomly)

title: Cold Snap
text: You take 2d6 points of cold damage

title: Caster's Block
text: You cannot cast this spell for 24 hour

title: You made him bigger
text: Target increases one size category for 1d4 rounds

title: Weak-Minded Fool
text: You take 1 point of Wis bleed

title: Power Down
text: You take 1 point of Int bleed

title: Mental Slip
text: On his next turn, your target may give you one suggestion

title: Power Transfer
text: The highest level spell effect on you is transferred to your target

title: Magical Vacuum
text: 1d3 spell effects active on you are dispelled (determined randomly)

title: Blastoff
text: You are thrown 1d6x10 feet into the air (or in a random direction if flying) (Will negates)

title: It's Sparkly
text: You are blinded for 1 round

title: Now I see you!
text: Your target becomes invisible for 1d4 rounds

title: Unexpected Blast
text: The spell affects all targets within 30 feet of you. You are immune to this effect

title: Jumbled Components
text: You can only take a move action next round

title: Spell Shield
text: The target gains SR equal to 11 + your caster level for 1d6 rounds

title: Side Effect
text: One of your magic items permanently gains a random drawback (DMG 273)

title: This is Hard
text: You take 1 point of Con damage

title: Magical Smackdown
text: You automatically fail your next saving throw

title: Reflection
text: The spell hits you instead of the target (normal saves apply)

title: Monster Rift
text: Your spell is converted to a summon monster spell of the same level. The monster attacks you

title: Fragmented Magic
text: 1d4+2 mirror images spring up around your target. These images last for 1 minute or until destroyed

title: How did that happen?
text: A stinking cloud appears, centered on you

title: Energy Transfer
text: Lose one randomly determined spell or spell slot. Your target can cast this spell next round

title: Power Drain
text: You lose one prepared spell or spell slot (determined randomly)
